display_help: You slash violently at your target, causing several quick bursts of cold and lethal damage.
display_target_help: You have been affected by the Sentinel's touch and suffer cold and lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
